parameters.query:
SELECT 
    e.first_name AS doctor_nombre, 
    e.email AS doctor_email,
    v.start_date AS cita_hora,
    c.first_name AS paciente_nombre,
    c.last_name AS paciente_apellido
FROM miconsul_uno.tevents v
JOIN miconsul_uno.ospos_people e ON v.doctor_id = e.person_id
JOIN miconsul_uno.ospos_people c ON v.patient_id = c.person_id
WHERE DATE(v.start_date) = CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY
ORDER BY doctor_email, cita_hora ASC;
